navigation.completeProfile: Complete your profile and select roles to access features.

crewDashboard.signInBanner: Sign in and complete your profile to see full journey details, dates, boat information, and skipper details

hero.subtitle: Connect boat owners with experienced crew members for unforgettable sailing adventures

forOwners.title: For Boat Owners
forOwners.description: Find experienced crew members for your sailing adventures. Post your journeys and connect with sailors worldwide and let AI find the perfect crew for you automatically.
forOwners.feature3: Automatch crew members or review and approve applications - you choose!

forCrew.title: For Crew Members
forCrew.description: Discover sailing opportunities worldwide. Browse journeys, match your skills, and join amazing adventures.
forCrew.feature2: Browse, search and SailSmart discover sailing opportunities worldwide based on your preferences
forCrew.feature3: Apply to join your dream voyage and get immediate feedback for eligibility

step1.title: Sign Up
step1.description: Create your account as an owner/skipper or crew member and setup your sailing profile

step2.title: Connect
step2.description: Owners post journeys, crew members discover and apply

step3.title: Sail Together
step3.description: AI or Owners approve applications and you're ready to set sail!

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Adventure?
cta.descriptionOwner: Create and publish your upcoming passages and destinations, and let AI assist you in finding the perfect crew.
cta.descriptionCrew: Your dream destinations and passages are just one click away!

matching.title: Smart Matching
matching.description: Our AI-powered system matches crew members with journeys based on skills and experience.

verified.title: Verified Profiles
verified.description: All crew members and boat owners are verified for a safe sailing experience.

global.title: Global Community
global.description: Connect with sailors from around the world and explore new destinations.

journeys.title: My Journeys & Legs
journeys.subtitle: Manage your journeys and their legs
journeys.noJourneysYet: You haven't created any journeys yet.
journeys.deleteJourneyConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this journey? This will permanently delete the journey and all its legs. This action cannot be undone.

browse.title: Browse Journeys
browse.subtitle: Find your next sailing adventure
browse.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new opportunities.

boats.addFirst: Add your first boat to start creating journeys

registrations.noLegsRegistered: You haven't registered for any legs yet.
registrations.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this registration?

ownerView.title: Crew Registrations
ownerView.noRegistrations: No crew registrations for this journey yet

allRegistrations.title: All Registrations
allRegistrations.subtitle: Manage crew registrations across all your journeys

profile.title: My Profile
profile.profileCreatedSuccess: Profile created successfully! Redirecting to dashboard...

setup.title: Complete Your Profile
setup.subtitle: Tell us about yourself to help us find the best matches

fields.bioPlaceholder: Tell us about yourself - your background, interests, and what brings you to sailing...
fields.rolesHelp: Select at least one role. You can be both!
fields.skillsPlaceholder: Describe your experience with this skill...
fields.certificationsPlaceholder: List your sailing certifications, licenses, or qualifications
fields.sailingPreferencesPlaceholder: Describe your sailing goals, what kind of sailing excites you...

experienceLevels.beginnerDesc: New to sailing, eager to learn the basics
experienceLevels.competentDesc: Can handle most crew duties, familiar with sailing terms
experienceLevels.coastalDesc: Experienced in coastal navigation and can skipper day sails
experienceLevels.offshoreDesc: Qualified to skipper offshore passages and lead crew

riskLevels.coastalDesc: Day sailing and short coastal trips

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.notifyWhenHappens: We'll notify you when something happens

assistant.title: SailSmart Assistant
assistant.greetingMessageCrew: I can help you find sailing opportunities, manage your profile, and more. What would you like to do?
assistant.greetingMessageOwner: I can help you create journeys, manage your boats, and more. What would you like to do?

consent.title: Enable AI Assistant
consent.description: To use the AI Assistant, you need to enable AI processing in your privacy settings.

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.subtitle: Manage your privacy preferences, export your data, or delete your account.
privacy.dataProcessingDesc: Allow us to process your data to provide our services
privacy.aiProcessingDesc: Allow us to use AI to match your profile with sailing opportunities. Your profile data will be processed by our AI partner.
privacy.profileSharingDesc: Allow boat owners to view your profile when you apply for crew positions. Please note that without this consent, you are not able to register for journeys or legs.
privacy.analyticsDesc: Help us improve by allowing anonymous usage analytics
privacy.marketingDesc: Receive emails about new features, tips, and sailing opportunities.
privacy.consentControlDesc: Control how your data is used. You can change these settings at any time.
privacy.emailNotificationsDesc: Choose which email notifications you want to receive.
privacy.registrationUpdatesDesc: Get notified when your crew applications are approved or denied.
privacy.journeyUpdatesDesc: Get notified about changes to journeys you're registered for.
privacy.profileRemindersDesc: Get reminded to complete your profile for better matching.
privacy.yourDataDesc: Here's a summary of the data we have about you.
privacy.name: Name
privacy.exportDataDesc: Download a copy of all your personal data in JSON format. This includes your profile, boats, registrations, and consent history.
privacy.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
privacy.deleteConfirmDesc: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data including:

deleteConfirmItems.boats: All boats and journeys you've created

privacy.deleteConfirmType: Type DELETE MY ACCOUNT to confirm:
privacy.failedToUpdate: Failed to update consent. Please try again.
privacy.failedToExport: Failed to export data. Please try again.
privacy.failedToDelete: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

serverError.title: Something Went Wrong
serverError.description: We're having trouble loading this page. Please try again.

unauthorized.title: Sign In Required
unauthorized.description: You need to be signed in to access this page.

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.description: You don't have permission to access this page.

network.title: Connection Error
network.description: Please check your internet connection and try again.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address

metadata.title: SailSmart - Connect Sailors Worldwide
metadata.description: Join the global sailing community. Find crew positions or recruit experienced sailors for your next adventure.
metadata.ogDescription: Connect boat owners with crew members for unforgettable sailing adventures.

feedback.pageDescription: Share your ideas, report bugs, and help us improve SailSmart.
feedback.signInToVote: Sign in to vote on feedback
feedback.guestBannerDescription: Sign in to submit feedback, vote on ideas, and help shape the future of SailSmart.
feedback.title: Title
feedback.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide more details about your feedback...
feedback.submitError: Failed to submit feedback. Please try again.
feedback.noFeedbackDescription: Try adjusting your filters or be the first to submit feedback!
feedback.noFeedbackYetDescription: You haven't submitted any feedback yet. Share your ideas!
feedback.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this feedback?
feedback.feedbackNotFoundDescription: This feedback may have been deleted or you don't have permission to view it.
feedback.fetchError: Failed to load feedback. Please try again.
feedback.generalPromptMessage: Have ideas for making SailSmart better? We'd love to hear from you.
feedback.postJourneyPromptMessage: You recently completed "{journeyName}". Share your feedback to help us improve!
